text: Yelena Lvovna Shushunova (; name sometimes rendered Elena Shushunova; 23 April 1969 – 16 August 2018) was a Russian World, European, and Olympic championship winning gymnast. Shushunova was one of five women who have won the grand slam of All-Around titles: Olympics, World Championships, European/Continental Championships. She was born in Leningrad. Shushunova died from complications of pneumonia on August 16, 2018 in Saint Petersburg, aged 49. ==References== ==Other websites== * List of competitive results at Gymn Forum * Biography * Whatever Happened to Elena Shushunova? * Schuschunova element on the floor (3rd one in the sequence) – animated .gif Category:1969 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Russian gymnasts Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Yelena Shushunova
